Feats-Skill-Lore -- Male Half-Elf Wizard: 3
Strength: 14 (+2) Dexterity: 12 (+1) Constitution: 12 (+1) Intelligence: 16 (+3) Wisdom: 12 (+1) Charisma: 12 (+1)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 2500/3000 Level: 3 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 7/12
Ability Notes: Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 1; Class: 2; General: 1; Skill: 1 Selectable Feature Count: Human (Heritage); Wizard (Arcane School); Wizard (Thesis)

Feature Notes:

Arcane Thesis: 1 selection
General Feats: 1 selections
Half-Elf: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Metamagical Experimentation: +1 Class Feat (metamagic wizard)
Skill Feats: 1 selections
Wizard Feats: 1 selections
Familiar: May have a familiar
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +6 (wisdom; trained)
Skill Modifiers:
Abadar Lore: +10 (intelligence; expert) Diplomacy: +1 (charisma; untrained) Religion: +6 (wisdom; trained)
Acrobatics: +1 (dexterity; untrained) Intimidation: +1 (charisma; untrained) Scribing Lore: +8 (intelligence; trained)
Arcana: +10 (intelligence; expert) Medicine: +6 (wisdom; trained) Society: +8 (intelligence; trained)
Athletics: +2 (strength; untrained) Nature: +6 (wisdom; trained) Stealth: +1 (dexterity; untrained)
Crafting: +8 (intelligence; trained) Occultism: +3 (intelligence; untrained) Survival: +6 (wisdom; trained)

Languages: Common; Dwarven; Elven; Goblin; Jotun
Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Abadar Lore): Skill Expert (Abadar Lore)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +3 Language Count
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 1 from any)
Wizard Skills: Skill Trained (Arcana; Choose 5 from any)
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the income
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step with a successful DC 10 Society check to Recall Knowledge/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures on any trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master rank provide additional information
Combat
Hit Points: 29 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +8 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes: Canny Acumen (Reflex): Save Expert (Reflex)
Magic
Spell Slots: A1: 4; A2: 3; AC1: 5 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Arcane: +8 (intelligence; trained) Spell DC: Arcane: 18 (intelligence; trained)
Spells: Warped Terrain (A1 Foc Ill): (1) R60' 5' burst (2 or 3 actions give a 10' or 15' burst) illusion inflicts difficult terrain for 1 min (heightened 4th affects air instead of surface)
Magic Notes:
Illusion: +1 spell slot each level/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point/Knows the Warped Terrain arcane spell
Arcane Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the arcane tradition
Drain Bonded Item: (F) Can cast an expended spell using power stored in a possession once per day
Illusion: Knows 1 additional 1st-level illusion spell
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
Notes
Validation Errors:
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 2 available vs. 5 allocated
Legendary Professional Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 15 and lore rank (currently 2) >= 4
